businessProfile.name: Boardtown Pizza & Pints
businessProfile.address: 705 University Dr Suite C, Starkville, MS 39759, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 705 University Dr Suite C, Starkville, MS 39759, USA

reviews.text: Look.... everywhere I go I ask around and research where the best pizza places to eat are.  I was only in Stark Vegas for a short time but settled on Boardtown after some recommendations.  So glad I did.  The pizza was great!  One of my favorites I've had anywhere in Mississippi and id score it pretty high overall anywhere I've been.  Service was spotty.  Though nothing I would complain about but not compliment either. Atmosphere was a little loud which was understood since it was right near student housing.  But go there for the pizza! Also the fries app were surprisingly good!

I was at Boardtown Pizza this past Friday night, and they blew me away. Coming from the NJ/NY area, where pizza standards are sky-high, I wasn‚Äôt sure what to expect. But this was some of the best Neapolitan aesthetic, brick oven I‚Äôve ever had. Perfectly crisp crust, balanced sauce, and fresh toppings‚Ä¶ everything was on point.

The vibe was great, the staff was incredible , and the quality truly rivals what you‚Äôd find in the Northeast. Honestly, this place deserves national attention‚Ä¶.

Boardtown has officially raised the bar for pizza in Starkville. If you‚Äôre in town, don‚Äôt miss it.
Pizza dough way too soft...0 crunch.. no stability... ingredients were good the dough just needs more attention.... wings were great... beer selection good ..appetizers great

Not from the area but saw this place on the top recommended for Starkville. Some of the best pizza we have ever had. We had the breakfast pizza and the elote pizza, both AMAZING. Great beer selection, in an entertainment district as well. Owners are so wholesome. Lillie our bartender was also so great. Would go back and recommend to anyone going or in the area.

We ordered two pizza to go. One was a White Pizza and the other a Bikini Bottom. The pizzas were perfectly cooked. The only issue is there was no flavor. The tomato sauce on the bikini bottom was flavorless. I love San Marzano tomatoes but there was no other seasoning added. No flavor at all. The ricotta, which is one of my favorite ingredients, was straight ricotta. They make a nice pie and they use good ingredients. But it all lacks flavor. No salt, no nothing. If they could figure that out, it would be amazing pizza. Honestly, for the money go to the cheaper places. This is not it. Maybe a straight pepperoni pizza would be the way to go, hoping the pepperoni adds flavor. We did not finish the pizza.

Update: The owner reached out and I do appreciate local businesses. So, I changed my review to four stars for that reason. I am a fan of bold flavors. Maybe that is my downfall. But the White Pizza tasted like nothing but roasted garlic and oil. The ricotta doesn‚Äôt come through at all. And the bikini bottom tastes nothing like a Hawaiian. Crunchy pineapple and jalape√±os. That‚Äôs the whole flavor profile. Nothing worked together on either pizza to build a cohesive and tasty pizza. Maybe I should have had some pints beforehand.

recentReviews.text:
Got Boardtown to-go as it was game time.

Tried the Kitchen sink and wings. Everything was fantastic!

The kitchen sink is a supreme pizza. Pepperoni, Italian sausage, veggies, sauce and cheese. The crust is great. Just the right amount of char.

The wings are out of sight! We got the lemon pepper. Fried crispy. Seasoned well. A fantastic homemade ranch dipping sauce and fresh carrots and celery sticks.

Comfortable atmosphere and will return!
Pizza dough way too soft...0 crunch.. no stability... ingredients were good the dough just needs more attention.... wings were great... beer selection good ..appetizers great

Not from the area but saw this place on the top recommended for Starkville. Some of the best pizza we have ever had. We had the breakfast pizza and the elote pizza, both AMAZING. Great beer selection, in an entertainment district as well. Owners are so wholesome. Lillie our bartender was also so great. Would go back and recommend to anyone going or in the area.
Great selection of craft beers with rotating options. Katie was our server, and she was the best. 10/10 would go again!

I was at Boardtown Pizza this past Friday night, and they blew me away. Coming from the NJ/NY area, where pizza standards are sky-high, I wasn‚Äôt sure what to expect. But this was some of the best Neapolitan aesthetic, brick oven I‚Äôve ever had. Perfectly crisp crust, balanced sauce, and fresh toppings‚Ä¶ everything was on point.

The vibe was great, the staff was incredible , and the quality truly rivals what you‚Äôd find in the Northeast. Honestly, this place deserves national attention‚Ä¶.

Boardtown has officially raised the bar for pizza in Starkville. If you‚Äôre in town, don‚Äôt miss it.
It‚Äôs a me, Luigi. I approve this message
BoardTown pizza is the pizza for you and me!
Excellent pizza and good beer selection.

detailedReviews.author: Matthew Thompson
detailedReviews.text:
Got Boardtown to-go as it was game time.

Tried the Kitchen sink and wings. Everything was fantastic!

The kitchen sink is a supreme pizza. Pepperoni, Italian sausage, veggies, sauce and cheese. The crust is great. Just the right amount of char.

The wings are out of sight! We got the lemon pepper. Fried crispy. Seasoned well. A fantastic homemade ranch dipping sauce and fresh carrots and celery sticks.

Comfortable atmosphere and will return!

detailedReviews.text: Pizza dough way too soft...0 crunch.. no stability... ingredients were good the dough just needs more attention.... wings were great... beer selection good ..appetizers great

detailedReviews.author: Toby Rogers
detailedReviews.text: BoardTown pizza is the pizza for you and me!

detailedReviews.author: Thomas Johnson
detailedReviews.text: Excellent pizza and good beer selection.

detailedReviews.author: penny lee
detailedReviews.text: Great little Jewel in downtown Starkville,ms

detailedReviews.author: Ches Fedric
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza & wings in town

detailedReviews.author: Kealy Shields
detailedReviews.text: We were looking for something new to try and I recently saw a TikTok about them. Food was really good and our waitress was great! We ordered Brussels sprouts, Margherita pizza, and lemon pepper wings.

detailedReviews.author: AJ Tanner
detailedReviews.text: Food was good but they forgot to cut my pizza and were out of wings

detailedReviews.author: Vicki Leach
detailedReviews.text: LOvE Boardtown Pizza and Pints! We‚Äôll grab a pizza,  or just burrata, hummus and a salad;  everything is fresh!  We enjoy this little hidden gem very much. .

detailedReviews.author: Drew Hill
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in Starkville and it‚Äôs not close

detailedReviews.author: Bo Peacock
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in Mississippi

detailedReviews.author: Abbie
detailedReviews.text: Patrick is cool

detailedReviews.author: Michelle Tehan
detailedReviews.text: So dang good!! Love their fries, their pizza isü§åüî•

detailedReviews.author: UFANSINCE 73
detailedReviews.text: Excellent pizza! Brussel sprouts are fire! Can't wait to go back.

detailedReviews.author: Misty Francom
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza and root beer floats in town! We love board town pizza.

detailedReviews.author: marcello mancini
detailedReviews.text: Muy buenas comidas rapidas

detailedReviews.author: P ‚ÄúCoachPrep‚Äù S
detailedReviews.text: Look.... everywhere I go I ask around and research where the best pizza places to eat are.  I was only in Stark Vegas for a short time but settled on Boardtown after some recommendations.  So glad I did.  The pizza was great!  One of my favorites I've had anywhere in Mississippi and id score it pretty high overall anywhere I've been.  Service was spotty.  Though nothing I would complain about but not compliment either. Atmosphere was a little loud which was understood since it was right near student housing.  But go there for the pizza! Also the fries app were surprisingly good!

detailedReviews.author: Bryan Dennis
detailedReviews.text: The beer selection was great and the one I got was ice cold. The bartender was very nice and observant. The brussel sprouts, arugula salad and pizza were very good and cooked well. It‚Äôs one of our favorite spots that is locally owned.

detailedReviews.author: Sabreena Michel
detailedReviews.text: LOVE the PIZZA! Best I have had in the South so far! Great brussels too!

detailedReviews.author: Oddball nobody
detailedReviews.text: Had some pizza there with my college group. It is a great deal for the excellent food you get!

detailedReviews.author: Megan Porter
detailedReviews.text: I always have great service here! All staff are very helpful, but tonight Rachel was really great! Food is always delicious.

detailedReviews.author: fajr hicks
detailedReviews.text: My family had such a great experience our waitress Rachel was so attentive and all the food was delicious. We highly recommend this places and Rachel carpenter to be your waitress.

detailedReviews.author: Brandon Arrigo
detailedReviews.text:
We ordered two pizza to go. One was a White Pizza and the other a Bikini Bottom. The pizzas were perfectly cooked. The only issue is there was no flavor. The tomato sauce on the bikini bottom was flavorless. I love San Marzano tomatoes but there was no other seasoning added. No flavor at all. The ricotta, which is one of my favorite ingredients, was straight ricotta. They make a nice pie and they use good ingredients. But it all lacks flavor. No salt, no nothing. If they could figure that out, it would be amazing pizza. Honestly, for the money go to the cheaper places. This is not it. Maybe a straight pepperoni pizza would be the way to go, hoping the pepperoni adds flavor. We did not finish the pizza.

Update: The owner reached out and I do appreciate local businesses. So, I changed my review to four stars for that reason. I am a fan of bold flavors. Maybe that is my downfall. But the White Pizza tasted like nothing but roasted garlic and oil. The ricotta doesn‚Äôt come through at all. And the bikini bottom tastes nothing like a Hawaiian. Crunchy pineapple and jalape√±os. That‚Äôs the whole flavor profile. Nothing worked together on either pizza to build a cohesive and tasty pizza. Maybe I should have had some pints beforehand.

detailedReviews.author: Jeneanne Liley
detailedReviews.text: Servers were all friendly, order delivery was fast and pizza was delicious

detailedReviews.author: Luis Camino
detailedReviews.text: The best pizzas in Starkville...

detailedReviews.author: Paul Tkach
detailedReviews.text: I need to leave this review because I‚Äôve been eating at your restaurant for quite some time. It was open today and they informed me 20 minutes before it was open and it was only going to be open at 4:30. They could have tried to service but since they did not, I will never go back and I‚Äôve eaten there many times Letting you know that‚Äôs not how to do business your staff needs to know how the communicate with customers, I will never go back

detailedReviews.author: Van Huggins
detailedReviews.text: I ordered delivery and there was excellent communication. My favorite pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Ava D
detailedReviews.text: love this place!!! super great service & the most delicious pizza!

detailedReviews.author: A
detailedReviews.text: Just wanted to give a shout out to the sweetest brunette waitress working the bar Saturday afternoon! Came by with my 2 kids and she kept them filled with soda & waters while introducing me to my new favorite beer! I‚Äôve been there several times and their pizza is definitely in my personal opinion the best in the state of Mississippi and although we didn‚Äôt eat on this particular visit she made it my favorite visit thus far.

detailedReviews.author: Michael Dorantes
detailedReviews.text:
One bit everybody knows the rules 7.6/10
Great pizza in Starkville missippii at 9pm on a Saturday night delivered via door dash. No complaints , got the job done .

detailedReviews.author: Curtis Weldon
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in Starkville!

detailedReviews.author: Clint Holt
detailedReviews.text:
The pizza was ok.  The ordering process was kind of cumbersome. We were provided menus after we were seated.  I then had to go back to the hostess stand and get back in line to order food.

Drinks were ordered via a QR code from the table.  I just feel like the ordering/serving process as a whole needs an overhaul.

detailedReviews.author: Ellen Harrell
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in Starkville!

detailedReviews.author: Brittany McKinney
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza. Phenomenal staff. Awesome atmosphere

detailedReviews.author: Brice Newton
detailedReviews.text: Vibes off the charts. Great service and even better pizza. 10/10 coming here again

detailedReviews.author: Wendy Martin
detailedReviews.text: Boardtown is first class!  Highly recommend on all fronts...food, service, quality, cleanliness and atmosphere.  Don't miss out on this gem!

detailedReviews.author: Olivia Klaas
detailedReviews.text: love the food love the people love the atmosphere!

detailedReviews.author: Kevin
detailedReviews.text: The fries suck. The chicken tenders probably come out of a Tyson chicken bag. Don't order them. Service time to get pizza was 45+ min after ordering

detailedReviews.author: Arianne H
detailedReviews.text: Every pizza I've tried from here has been a hit. It reminds me and my husband of the pizza we had in Italy! The Boardtown pizza dough is delicious and crisp, the toppings are fresh and so flavorful. Bonus, the instant self-order feature for drinks was convenient when we dined in.

detailedReviews.author: Bunny Monae
detailedReviews.text: Tried to dine in for my very first time eating here. Was greeted immediately and told to sit wherever. Once my friend and I got sat at 8:52 we were sitting for less than 2 minutes when the same employee who told us to sit anywhere told us that the kitchen is closed. Google on sunday shows that the restaurant close at 10 so for the kitchen to close almost an hour and a half earlier is confusing to me. Employees in the front were kind but I will probably not come back due to inacurate hours.

detailedReviews.author: Heidi Askeland
detailedReviews.text: Best gluten free pizza I have had yet! They changed gloves and prepared it on a different surface too.

detailedReviews.author: Brandi L Boyd
detailedReviews.text:
Food was delish!!
We had a pepperoni pizza, salad, and chicken tender basket.  The pizza is cooked in a fire roasted oven üòã and their sauces are made in house. Everything was great. The bartender was very pleasant ‚ú®Ô∏è‚ú®Ô∏è[I think his name is Zack]...

detailedReviews.author: Aimee Hawkins
detailedReviews.text:
We had the best food and experience at BTP&P. The owner took time to tell us about the process of using a brick oven and we brought home our own dough and toppings. We had a pizza party later that weekend. We will definitely be back.
Aimee & Kirk

detailedReviews.author: Evelyn Collins
detailedReviews.text: My husband and I had been here before and we liked it but this last Friday that we went with friends it was terrible. It was so expensive and they sent me my pizza burnt. This pizza was like $12 or $13 pizza and they sent it out like that. I wouldn't have served this to anyone whether they were paying or not.

detailedReviews.author: william Rosen
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza, with a great char on the crust! Plenty of drink options. Def a recommend to anyone who wants good pizza and beer in the Starkville area!

detailedReviews.author: Erin
detailedReviews.text: I come here every Friday for the lunch special ($10 one topping) and the beer special ($5 32oz). Tyler and staff are always super friendly and helpful. The pizza comes out in under 20 minutes. What‚Äôs not to love?? Great local business

detailedReviews.author: John Holder
detailedReviews.text: Best Pizza I have had in a long time.  Very Friendly.

detailedReviews.author: Chad Davis
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza

detailedReviews.author: ChrisinOSMS 2002
detailedReviews.text: 2 for 2! Both visits have been absolutely amazing.  The Slap Your Momma pizza was outstanding. I look forward to eating here while visiting my bulldog.

detailedReviews.author: Landagoose
detailedReviews.text: On 12/23/23 at 1 my grandfather and I got a pepperoni pie (14$) and 2 drinks (3$ each) which is 10 bucks for someone to eat a delicious new york style pie and get a larger than most soda. I mean, I don‚Äôt know what type of wizardry the chefs were doing in the back but that pepperoni pizza was crispy, steaming hot, and so good that I would likely be struck from the heavens for saying that every ingredient wasn‚Äôt fresh and/or made in-house. The service was good and the atmosphere was really welcoming. Seriously, this is THE spot if you want a good pie in Starkville.

detailedReviews.author: Katy Edwards
detailedReviews.text: The pizzas and hummus were tasty, however the staff began closing around 9:00 and when we wanted a refill of lemonade, the soda fountain nozzles had been removed for cleaning. That‚Äôs great that they keep their equipment clean, however, if there are still patrons eating in the restaurant, the soda fountain should be operational. Also, the bathroom garbage can was emptied and turned upside down, leaving no option but to leave trash on top of the can! We had an order total of $100 but when we asked for a container of ranch, there was a $1.00 surcharge for each. Appetizer and pizza were delivered without any plates, leaving us to ask the disgruntled server for some. We have been to Boardtown about 5 times in the last year, but this will be our last.

detailedReviews.author: Danielle Bowles
detailedReviews.text: Amazing people! Amazing food! Great drinks! 10 out of 10!

detailedReviews.author: Fran Walker
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza.

detailedReviews.author: William Terrell
detailedReviews.text: Traveling through. This pizza place is awesome. Pizza came out quick. Great pizza and beer selection! Highly recommend the side dish Brussel Sprouts

detailedReviews.author: Nicole Terrell
detailedReviews.text: Brussel sprouts and pizza were great!  Also a good beer selection.  We were passing through and glad we stopped here!  The owner obviously takes a lot of pride in this place and is doing a great job!

detailedReviews.author: Zach Palmer
detailedReviews.text: Visited this establishment on 10/22/23. Daiquiri machine was down. Pizza was extremely thin in the center and made a mess/fell apart but taste was good. Cups did not have lids. Overall, $25 fed me and my girlfriend, customer service was good, experience was not the best overall due to down Daiquiri machine, missing lids, and extremely thin and messy Pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Granville Barker
detailedReviews.text: They used to have a hostess and servers, now they want you to order at the counter and serve yourself, yet there is no signage to indicate this.

detailedReviews.author: Todd Bennett
detailedReviews.text: Great service Great food and a relaxed atmosphere

detailedReviews.author: Katie Mills
detailedReviews.text: We attended a pizza making class here that was amazing! We learned all about the dough and how to form a perfect pizza. The owner was very informative and kind. Other than being an amazing environment, the pizza was phenomenal! The employees seemed to really enjoy their jobs, and it was an overall super fun and unique experience. I will definitely be back!

detailedReviews.author: Mark Templeton
detailedReviews.text: This use to be one of our favorites for pizza however we want be back. Sad thing is pizza was good the guy behind the bar who took my payment that is the reason we want be back. I ask what I thought was a simple question.  Are the prices on your website not accurate? His response yes they are I told him what the website menu price was compared to my bill and you would have thought the world ended. His response, I guess he needs to change it.  He? He who? Then just tossed my card across the bar and walked away. Sorry call me old school but I still expect some sort of customer service.  I'll do papa John's next time they at least appreciate the business.

detailedReviews.author: Zachary Grubbs
detailedReviews.text: This is always one of my go to stops each and every time I am in Starkville. The food is always  top notch. The service is always A+, even when it  is a busy gameday weekend.  You also cannot beat the draft beer selection. If you are looking for good food and drinks in the Cotton District, you need to go to Boardtown.

detailedReviews.author: Diellen Lima
detailedReviews.text: We are new in town and decided to try this place out. What a great surprise! Ordered take out and the pizza was ready in 20min. Probably the closest you will have of a Neapolitan pizza. Our choice was a little spice for our taste, but still delicious.  I think I already have my favorite pizza place in Starkville.

detailedReviews.author: Jenna-Mae Paz
detailedReviews.text: My friends and I walked by here during game day weekend and decided to check it out. Sadly, we were disappointed. Our pizzas were undercooked, and the wings were made in the wrong flavor. It could‚Äôve easily been fixed had our server been more attentive instead of taking shots with another table, as he only came to our table to take our orders and give us our checks. I understand how busy it can get during game day weekends, but I feel the service could be better with some improvements.

detailedReviews.author: Morgan
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in town, and a great selection of beers on tap.

detailedReviews.author: Jared Hinton
detailedReviews.text: This place offers great pizza and a great selection of craft beers. Perfect place to grab a pie.

detailedReviews.author: Cassandra McCarter
detailedReviews.text: Awesome beer selection, will definitely go back just to try more of their drafts on tap. Pizza was ok (bikini bottom), appetizers nachos were really good but would have been better w/fries instead of chips. Would recommend you give them a try, had a fun time w/friends for my birthday.

detailedReviews.author: Brooke Rankins
detailedReviews.text: I went there yesterday (10/7/2022) with 3 of my friends (all African American). The bouncer told us that there was a $10 cover charge. We then sat at a table beside the door for a while and as numerous other people (Caucasian) went through the line, I heard him tell them that the cover charge was $5. I then approached the bouncer and asked if the cover was $10 or $5. He said that the price just dropped to $5. I called Boardtown Pizza today, and a lady told me that their cover is typically $5 and that she wasn‚Äôt aware of it ever being $10. I feel like we were discriminated against and told a higher amount to either take advantage of us or discourage us from going inside.

detailedReviews.author: austin stranahan
detailedReviews.text: Love this place. Great pizza and great selection of beer. This is our go to spot in Starkville. The staff is always kind and attentive, and the food is great. Must try if you're looking for pizza in town.

detailedReviews.author: William Clanton
detailedReviews.text: Great place to eat!

detailedReviews.author: Anthony Uren
detailedReviews.text: Been coming here for literally years, it's had it's bad times and went thru some employees... But today everyone was nice the food was spot on and we had a very pleasant experience... We live out here and don't like to go to town so give it a try again might be very surprised

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.6/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers rave about the perfectly crisp crust and balanced sauce of the Neapolitan-style pizza, which rivals the best from the NJ/NY area. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
The rotating craft beer selection and the great beer variety are highly appreciated by customers. - social media marketing can showcase this strength

The wings, especially the lemon pepper variety, are praised for being fried crispy and well-seasoned, complemented by a fantastic homemade ranch dipping sauce. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews and reputation issues, such as inconsistent service and undercooked or flavorless food - review management can address this concern
Long wait times and cumbersome ordering processes - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Lack of atmosphere/ambiance awareness, such as confusion about ordering processes and early closing times - social media marketing can improve this area

The kitchen sink is a supreme pizza. Pepperoni, Italian sausage, veggies, sauce and cheese. The crust is great. Just the right amount of char.

The wings are out of sight! We got the lemon pepper. Fried crispy. Seasoned well. A fantastic homemade ranch dipping sauce and fresh carrots and celery sticks.

Comfortable atmosphere and will return!

Google on sunday shows that the restaurant close at 10 so for the kitchen to close almost an hour and a half earlier is confusing to me. Employees in the front were kind but I will probably not come back due to inacurate hours.

negative.author: Evelyn Collins
negative.text: My husband and I had been here before and we liked it but this last Friday that we went with friends it was terrible. It was so expensive and they sent me my pizza burnt. This pizza was like $12 or $13 pizza and they sent it out like that. I wouldn't have served this to anyone whether they were paying or not.

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
